name: China State Construction Engineering Corp.
description: The Chinese government-owned company was awarded a $19.6 million contract for road and infrastructure work as part of the residential piece of Trump World Golf Club Dubai project called Akoya Oxygen, according to a news release dated Sunday. CSCEC was awarded a $32 million contract to build a six-lane road in early 2017, just as President Donald Trump was inaugurated and it was hired in February to construct one of the buildings at a cost of $163 million.
